text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a TRFR

name: ActClassTransfer
title: ActClassTransfer
description: **Definition:** The act of transferring information without the intent of imparting understanding about a topic to the subject that is the recipient or holder of the transferred information where the participation association must be RCV or HLD.
